name: Improved Concussive Shot
baseDescription: Gives your Concussive Shot a 4% chance to stun the target for 3 sec.

name: Efficiency
baseDescription: Reduces the Mana cost of your Shots and Stings by 2%.

name: Improved Hunter's Mark
baseDescription: Increases the Ranged Attack Power bonus of your Hunter's Mark spell by 3%.

name: Lethal Shots
baseDescription: Increases your critical strike chance with ranged weapons by 1%.

name: Aimed Shot
baseDescription: An aimed shot that increases ranged damage by 70.

name: Improved Arcane Shot
baseDescription: Reduces the cooldown of your Arcane Shot by 0.2 sec.

name: Hawk Eye
baseDescription: Increases the range of your ranged weapons by 2 yards.

name: Improved Serpent Sting
baseDescription: Increases the damage done by your Serpent Sting by 2%.

name: Mortal Shots
baseDescription: Increases your ranged weapon critical strike damage bonus by 6%.

name: Scatter Shot
baseDescription: A short-range shot that deals 50% weapon damage and disorients the target for 4 sec.  Any damage caused will remove the effect.  Turns off your attack when used.

name: Barrage
baseDescription: Increases the damage done by your Multi-Shot and Volley spells by 5%.

name: Improved Scorpid Sting
baseDescription: Reduces the Stamina of targets affected by your Scorpid Sting by 10% of the amount of Strength reduced.

name: Ranged Weapon Specialization
baseDescription: Increases the damage you deal with ranged weapons by 1%.

name: Trueshot Aura
baseDescription: Increases the attack power of party members within 45 yards by 50.  Lasts 30 min.
